summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EKA-AI Platform. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly with proper branding and navigation, but AI chat functionality has a critical bug preventing message sending.

ui_bugs.issue: Send button click does not trigger handleSend function - messages are not sent to backend

integration_issues.issue: No API requests made to /api/chat endpoint when send button is clicked

design_issues.issue: Messages not displayed in conversation area - UI remains in initial state

passed_tests: Backend Job Cards CRUD operations (all endpoints)
Frontend homepage loads with EKA-AI branding
Frontend /claude-chat page loads with proper interface
Frontend dark theme styling applied correctly
Frontend no JavaScript console errors (after Supabase fix)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix AI chat send functionality in ClaudeLikeChat component. The handleSend function is not being triggered when send button is clicked. Input field is not cleared and no API requests are made to /api/chat endpoint. This breaks the core AI chat feature.
